data.title: 4Test AS
data.text:
AE TECHRON products on www.4test.no

AE TECHRON Amplifier Selector Page

Beginnings

AE Techron, was founded as Audio Electronics Inc., in August of 1992, by former employees of the Techron division of Crown.

Its purpose has been to create high-quality, durable electronic products for research, the military and industry—including EMC testing, MRI/NMR and the power relay test industries.

Out of this work has come lines of reliable power amplifiers, test systems and test and measurement products, and an inventory of electronic building blocks that helps us to provide quick-to-market custom electronic solutions for our customers. This is indicated by the figure shown below.

Focus - More Than Just an EMC Manufacturer

AE Techron (AET) is recognized as a company providing leading edge EMC solution. However, their products serves a much larger marked.

To see where AET fits in the bigger picture, it is important to understand their core capabilities.

Years ago, Crown Amplifiers reigned supreme for their high fidelity and durability. Their Techron division earned a reputation for powering GE MRI machines with unparalleled accuracy and reliability.

Today, AET have carved out a niche in the “Mid-Frequency” space, renowned for their low noise, robust construction, cost-effectiveness, and exceptional technical support. However, their industry standing extends far beyond just EMC.

AET operates in a unique space where solutions between DC and 1 MHz are often required and sometimes customized. These solutions necessitate clean power with the industry’s best low-noise floor, leading to many applications beyond EMC. Here are just a few examples:

Research projects typically at university physics and electrical engineering departments.

Military applications such as sonar and warship communications

Imaging applications like NMR, MRI, MPI; in research and manufacturing

Magnetic applications such as subsurface geological surveys, underground pipeline inspection, and even nuclear fusion (think plasma containment)

Industrial power for shaker manufacturers (many need our power solutions)

The common need for all these opportunities is:

Operating between DC and 1 MHz

Driving low impedance

Technical guidance and innovative solutions

Low noise

Steady Growth

AE Techron has grown steadily since its beginnings and now consists of four separate product and service areas:

AE Techron standard power supplies, power amplifiers, and test systems.

AE Techron custom design and manufacturing services.

Repair of Techron and AE Techron products.

Repair of Crown legacy audio products.
